entities.name: red card
entities.description: A red card is mentioned as a concept that Hagrid and Dean are discussing in the context of Quidditch. It is described as something that Flint could have used to knock Harry out of the air.

relationships.description: Hagrid suggests that Flint could have used a red card to knock Harry out of the air, implying that Flint had the capability to use such an object.
